faq.a: Copy trading means your account automatically mirrors trades from a strategy provider. You stay in control of your account settings and risk limits.

faq.q: What is an amplified or instant funded account?
faq.a: An amplified (instant funded) account is where your deposited value is multiplied for trading purposes, while risk controls still apply.
For the latest News, Updates, Strategy Performance and other key information please ensure you have subscribed to the official Pandora AI Telegram group.
